title: Natural Treatment Solutions For Cleaning Up Mold - Videos from The Weather Channel
description: Mold can grow on any surface. When you discover mold or mildew in your home, try these natural treatment solutions instead of chemicals for an environmentally friendly cleaning project. - Videos from The Weather Channel | weather.com
cleaned_text: August 15, 2023 Mold can grow on any surface. When you discover mold or mildew in your home, try these natural treatment solutions instead of chemicals for an environmentally friendly cleaning project. Now Playing Next Up
